desktop.name: Prioritize visible content
desktop.recommendation:
Your page requires additional network round trips to render the above-the-fold content. For best performance, reduce the amount of HTML needed to render above-the-fold content.

56.6KiB of the HTML response was required to render the above-the-fold content. This requires 3 network round-trips. Prioritize the above-the-fold content so that it can be rendered with only the first 2 round-trips' worth of HTML.

 * Only about 69% of the final above-the-fold content could be rendered with the HTML delivered within 2 round-trips snapshot:1.
